biotools.summary:
A miRNA expression database with isoform resolution.
isomiRdb stores miRNA and isomiR expression values for 42499 miRNA-seq samples collected from miRMaster, The Cancer Genome Atlas and Sequence Read Archive and uniformly processed from raw reads using sRNAbench .

bioschemas.name: isomiRdb
